entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
